info.title: ODIN Fleet API
info.description:
API to access Odin Fleet, empowering developers to deploy gameservers all around the world in just a few lines of code.

To authenticate, users must send their email, password, and session ID to the **[`/api/auth`](/operations/getAuthToken)** endpoint. Upon successful authentication, an API token will be provided. This token should be included in the `Authorization` header as a Bearer token for all subsequent requests.
    
Alternatively, you can copy your API key directly from our **[`console`](https://console.4players.io)** by opening any app, and then going to **Settings -> API Keys**.

get.summary: Show a specific app location setting
Show all location settings
Show all services for a specific app location setting within a given app
Show all apps
Show a specific app

post.description:
Authenticates the user based on the user's email, password, and session ID.
If the user is authenticated successfully, it returns the user's token.

The token is non-expiring and must be used as a Bearer token in subsequent requests.

get.summary: Show all binaries

post.summary: Create a binary and the related entity

get.summary: Show a specific binary

Refresh a binary and the related entity

get.summary: Show all services for a given app
Display a specific DockerService associated with the given App
Show all docker registries
Display a specific docker registry
List all available tagged images
Refresh the cache for all available tagged images
Get stdout and stderr logs from a service or task

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Show extra details provided to logs. Default: false

parameters.name: stdout
parameters.description: Return logs from stdout. Default: true

parameters.name: stderr
parameters.description: Return logs from stderr. Default: true

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only return logs since this time, as a UNIX timestamp. Default: 0

parameters.name: timestamps
parameters.description: Add timestamps to every log line. Default: false

parameters.name: tail
parameters.description: Only return this number of log lines from the end of the logs. Specify as an integer or all to output all log lines. Default: "all"
